sentences.english: Using diffirent methods, the quasar-galaxy associations are tested.
sentences.chinese: 本文进行了类星体和星系的成协性分析。

sentences.english: That is what makes a quasar.
sentences.chinese: 那就是，究竟是什么造就了一个类星体。

sentences.english: Quasar is short for quasi-stellar radio source.
sentences.chinese: 类星体是“类似恒星射电源”的缩写。

sentences.english: Other indications of mega-mergers come from relatively nearby quasars.
sentences.chinese: 其他的百万级合并的标志来自于相对近一些的类星体。

sentences.english: Which came first, the quasar or the galaxy?
sentences.chinese: 类星体和星系哪一个形成在前呢？

sentences.english: This quasar was the only one without a known host galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 这个类星体似乎无依无傍，不在任何一个星系当中。

sentences.english: Microquasars are black holes of about the same mass as a star.
sentences.chinese: 微型类星体是一种质量接近黑洞的恒星。

sentences.english: This paper presents a novel method for redshift determination of quasars .
sentences.chinese: 给出了一种新的类星体光谱的红移测量方法。

sentences.english: Quasars are so far away that they constitute the best frame of reference for measuring Earth’s rotation rate.
sentences.chinese: 到目前为止，类星体是测量地球自转最好的参照系。

sentences.english: Many quasars radiate as much power as100 trillion suns.
sentences.chinese: 类星体是“类似恒星射电源”的缩写。

sentences.english: Quasars or dwarf galaxies would scatter the elements more unevenly.
sentences.chinese: 类星体或矮星系可使这些元素散布得更不平均。

definition: extragalactic star system/galaxy (not including our Galaxy)
